languages.text: "В нашей командной цепи имеет место //конфликт//ошибка//категорическое непонимание императивов операции//. Единица Торбальд Железношкурый желает применить тактику масштабных разрушений, что является неприемлемым нарушением ритуала эксплуатации. Каждый квадратный метр мануфакторумов //священен//обладает высокой производственной ценностью//".

"There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."
languages.original_text: "В нашей командной цепи имеет место //конфликт//ошибка//категорическое непонимание императивов операции//. Единица Торбальд Железношкурый желает применить тактику масштабных разрушений, что является неприемлемым нарушением ритуала эксплуатации. Каждый квадратный метр мануфакторумов //священен//обладает высокой производственной ценностью//".

languages.text: “因为我们的指挥系统重存在//冲突//关键错误//，对这次行动的必要性缺乏理解。索巴德·铁皮的部队认为应该进行大规模毁灭，但这种不可接受的决定会违背操作仪典。制造工厂的每一寸土地都是//神圣的//具有重要生产价值//。”
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."

traits.locale_text: “因为我们的指挥系统重存在//冲突//关键错误//，对这次行动的必要性缺乏理解。索巴德·铁皮的部队认为应该进行大规模毁灭，但这种不可接受的决定会违背操作仪典。制造工厂的每一寸土地都是//神圣的//具有重要生产价值//。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Il existe un //conflit//problème critique//manque catégorique de compréhension des impératifs de cette opération// au sein de notre hiérarchie. L'unité Thorbald Peau-de-Fer est en faveur d'une stratégie de destruction massive, ce qui enfreindrait de façon inacceptable le Rite d'Opération. Chaque mètre carré des manufactorums est //sacré//d'une grande valeur productive//. »
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."

traits.locale_text: « Il existe un //conflit//problème critique//manque catégorique de compréhension des impératifs de cette opération// au sein de notre hiérarchie. languages.text: 「//指揮系統内に//矛盾が生じている//重大なミスがある//この作戦の必須事項に対する理解//が欠如しています。ユニット・トールバルド・アイアンハイドは大量破壊作戦に賛成していますが、これは任務の儀礼に対する容認しがたい違反となります。聖工場の1平方メートルは//聖なる地//生産性の高い価値を持つもの//であります」
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."

traits.locale_text: 「//指揮系統内に//矛盾が生じている//重大なミスがある//この作戦の必須事項に対する理解//が欠如しています。ユニット・トールバルド・アイアンハイドは大量破壊作戦に賛成していますが、これは任務の儀礼に対する容認しがたい違反となります。聖工場の1平方メートルは//聖なる地//生産性の高い価値を持つもの//であります」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Se ha producido un //conflicto//error crítico//malentendido categórico de los menesteres de esta operación// en nuestra cadena de mando. La unidad Thorbald Piel de Hierro se posiciona a favor de una estrategia destructiva, lo cual podría constituir una flagrante transgresión del Rito de Operación. Cada metro cuadrado de los manufactorums es //sagrado//de gran valor productivo//».
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha producido un //conflicto//error crítico//malentendido categórico de los menesteres de esta operación// en nuestra cadena de mando. La unidad Thorbald Piel de Hierro se posiciona a favor de una estrategia destructiva, lo cual podría constituir una flagrante transgresión del Rito de Operación. Cada metro cuadrado de los manufactorums es //sagrado//de gran valor productivo//».
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "In unserer Befehlskette besteht ein //Konflikt//kritischer Fehler//kategorisches Übermaß an Unkenntnis der Ziele dieser Operation//. Einheit Thorbald Eisenhaut befürwortet die Strategie der Massenvernichtung, die einen inakzeptablen Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual darstellen würde. Jeder Quadratmeter der Manufactorien ist //heilig//von hohem Produktivitätswert//."
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."

traits.locale_text: "In unserer Befehlskette besteht ein //Konflikt//kritischer Fehler//kategorisches Übermaß an Unkenntnis der Ziele dieser Operation//. Einheit Thorbald Eisenhaut befürwortet die Strategie der Massenvernichtung, die einen inakzeptablen Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual darstellen würde. Jeder Quadratmeter der Manufactorien ist //heilig//von hohem Produktivitätswert//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Komuta zincirimizde //çelişki//kritik bir hata//bu harekatın gereksinimlerinin anlaşılmasına ilişkin kategorik bir eksiklik// meydana geldi. Thorbald Demirpost birimi, kitle imha stratejisini destekliyor. Ancak bu strateji, Faaliyet Ayini'ne istinaden kabul edilemez bir ihlal teşkil eder. Manufaktorumların her bir metrekaresi, //kutsaldır//yüksek üretim değerine sahiptir//."
languages.original_text: "There is a //conflict//critical error//categorical lack of understanding of the imperatives of this operation// within our chain of command. Unit Thorbald Ironhide is in favour of the strategy of mass destruction, which would constitute an unacceptable violation of the Rite of Operation. Every square metre of the manufactorums is //sacred//of high productivity value//."
